name: Sluggy Jean Endless Demo
description:
Heya! Sluggy Jean Takes A Hike came out almost a year ago! So I thought I would release a demo of a new form of slippery, slimy, sluggy content!

In this demo; you must run and jump out of the way of obstacles, get the highest score (done by collecting Light Bulbs), and you must do all of this within a small time frame! I hope you enjoy this demo, and hopefully it can become a full game one day!
